tests package¶

Submodules¶

tests.test_rovers module¶

tests.test_rovers.move_to_obstacles(instructions)¶

This function is for creating an obstacle in a specific position to later test if mars rovers stops when there is an obstacle in front.

Parameters:

instructions (string) – A list of characters containing instructions for the robot

tests.test_rovers.moves(instructions, position)¶

Given the instructions and the expected result this function asserts that the computed result by movement corresponds to the expected one.

Parameters:

  • instructions (string) – A list of characters containing instructions for the robot

  • position – String containing the position. e.g. 2:3:N

tests.test_rovers.rotation(instructions, result)¶

Given the instructions and the expected result this function asserts that the computed result by rotation corresponds to the expected one.

Parameters:

  • instructions (string) – A list of characters containing instructions for the robot

  • result (string) – This is a character of the orientation of the rovers

tests.test_rovers.test_left_rotation_east()¶

This test assures that after one rotation to the left, starting from (0,0,N), it faces West (W).

tests.test_rovers.test_left_rotation_north()¶

This test assures that after four rotations to the left, starting from (0,0,N), it faces North (N).

tests.test_rovers.test_left_rotation_south()¶

This test assures that after two rotations to the left, starting from (0,0,N), it faces South (S).

tests.test_rovers.test_left_rotation_west()¶

This test assures that after three rotations to the left, starting from (0,0,N), it faces East (E).

tests.test_rovers.test_move()¶

This test assures the combination of movements and rotations.

tests.test_rovers.test_move_with_wrap_around()¶

This test checks if the wrap around works properly given instructions that force the mars rovers to go outside the grid.

tests.test_rovers.test_right_rotation_east()¶

This test assures that after rotation to the right, starting from (0,0,N), it faces East (E).

tests.test_rovers.test_right_rotation_north()¶

This test assures that after four rotations to the right, starting from (0,0,N), it faces North (N).

tests.test_rovers.test_right_rotation_south()¶

This test assures that after two rotations to the right, starting from (0,0,N), it faces South (S).

tests.test_rovers.test_right_rotation_west()¶

This test assures that after three rotations to the right, starting from (0,0,N), it faces West (W).

tests.test_rovers.test_stop_if_obstacle()¶

This test checks if the mars rovers stops when it finds an obstacle in the next cell.
